fullText: James Franco and Chris O'Dowd make an odd couple as the mismatched buddies in Anna D. Shapiro's workmanlike revival of John Steinbeck's Depression-era drama.
dtliExcerpt: James Franco and Chris O'Dowd make an odd couple as the mismatched buddies in Anna D. Shapiro's workmanlike revival of John Steinbeck's Depression-era drama.
